name: Damian Franciszek Pospiech
profile_summary:
Results-driven Solutions Engineer with over 13 years of expertise in delivering high-performance SaaS applications, specializing in cloud platforms such as **AWS**, **Azure**, and **GCP**. Proficient in building dynamic API workflows and conducting technical proof of concepts. Adept at using **GitHub**, **BitBucket**, and **GitLab** for version control and collaboration on software development projects. 

Skilled in JavaScript/TypeScript, Python, and Flutter, with hands-on experience in both frontend and backend development utilizing **React**, **Next.js**, **Vue**, **Node.js**, **FastAPI**, and **Django**. Experienced in refining AI/ML-powered platforms that enhance predictive analytics and real-time processing. 

Expert in compliance-driven development, ensuring adherence to standards such as HIPAA, FHIR, PCI DSS, and SOC 2. Possesses a strong foundation in MLOps with tools like **MLflow**, **Airflow**, and **Kubeflow**. Recognized for impactful communication, collaboration, a solutions-oriented mindset, and a relentless curiosity to drive innovative solutions.
